Class Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.syntax.Format

  • public class Format
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Format.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl

      Constructor and Description
      Format(java.lang.String fmt, Token t, boolean before)
      Constructs a new format that can be used by a Formatter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Format

        public Format(java.lang.String fmt,
              Token t,
              boolean before)
        Constructs a new format that can be used by a Formatter.
        Parameters:
        fmt - The format to insert (typically <span style='...'>)
        t - The token that matches this format
        before - If the format should be inserted before or after the token

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public java.lang.String apply(Token input)
        Returns a string containing the given format if the input matches this format's token.
        Parameters:
        input - The input token to apply the format to
        Returns:
        The formatted string

        Returns:
